pages.text: $(li)The Siphon enchantment can be applied in a Shulker.$(br)If you pick an item that the Shulker Box has at least one of the same type, it will place this item in the Shulker Box insteat of your main inventory.$(br)$(li)This enchantment can be found Fishing or Trading with Villagers.
pages.title: Siphon
